#summary This is the overview of the EuEclipse Plug-In Project
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

The EuEclipse Plug-In will provide the ability to edit Euphoria code in the Eclipse development environment.  The functionality will largely mirror that of the Eclipse Java editor.


= Details =

  # [SyntaxHighliting Syntax Highlighting]
  # [CodeCompletion Context Sensitive code completion]
  # [SyntaxChecking Syntax checking]
  # [CodeTemplates Code templates]
  # [OutlineView Outline View]
  # [NamespaceExplorer Namespace Explorer]
  # [CodeTips Code Tips]
    * [EuDocCodeTips Hover over code to view EuDoc]
    * [ParameterSyntax Parameter Help]
